price: ដូចេ្នះ តើគេមិនដឹងទេឬថា នៅពេលដែលអ្វីៗនៅក្នុងផ្នូរ ត្រូវគេបពោ្ចញមក(ដើម្បីជំនុំជំរះ)?
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
